mapper.sql: ID, OMS_ID, NAME, SQJCZT, ZJLX, ZJHM, JBR, RETURN_TIME, LEND_REASON, DOCUMENT_NUM, YEAR, CLDYJ, BLDYJ, CLDYJLY, BLDYJLY, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_USER, MODYFY_TIME, LENDING_QUERY_START_TIME, LENDING_QUERY_END_TIME, IS_COMMIT
mapper.select:
select ocall.ID as id, ocall.OMS_ID as omsId, ocall.NAME as name, ocall.SQJCZT as sqjczt, ocall.ZJLX as zjlx, ocall.ZJHM as zjhm, org.WORK_UNIT as workUnit, org.INCUMBENCY_STATUS as incumbencyStatus, org.POST as post, org.SEX as sex from oms_cer_apply_lending_license ocall join oms_reg_procpersoninfo org on ocall.OMS_ID = org.ID
ocall.sqjczt=#{sqjczt} and
ocall.CREATE_TIME between #{lendingQueryStartTime} and #{lendingQueryEndTime} and
ocall.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or org.PY like concat('%',#{name},'%') and ocall.jbr like concat('%',#{jbr},'%') and
order by ocall.CREATE_TIME desc

select ocall.ID as id, ocall.OMS_ID as omsId, ocall.NAME as name, ocall.SQJCZT as sqjczt, #申请借出状态 ocall.ZJLX as zjlx, #证件类型 ocall.ZJHM as zjhm, #证件号码 ocall.CLDYJ as cldyj, #处领导意见 ocall.BLDYJ as bldyj, #部领导意见 ocall.JBR as jbr, #经办人 ocall.CREATE_TIME as createTime, #申请时间 ocall.RETURN_TIME as returnTime, #归还时间 ocall.LEND_REASON as lendReason, #借出原因 org.WORK_UNIT as workUnit, org.INCUMBENCY_STATUS as incumbencyStatus, #在职状态 org.POST as post, org.SEX as sex, cc.YXQZ as yxqz, #有效期至 cc.SURELY_UNIT as surelyUnit, #保管单位 cc.CSRQ as csrq #出生日期 from oms_cer_apply_lending_license ocall join oms_reg_procpersoninfo org on ocall.OMS_ID = org.ID join cf_certificate cc on cc.ZJHM = ocall.ZJHM
ocall.IS_COMMIT='1' and ocall.DOCUMENT_NUM=#{documentNum} and
order by createTime desc
select * from oms_cer_apply_lending_license group by year

select
from oms_cer_apply_lending_license
YEAR like concat(#{year},'%')
